typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		type as string,
		date as string,
		conversions as (id as string, type as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> getJson
source(output(
		{Flight#} as string,
		Origin as string,
		Dest as string,
		FlightDate as string,
		CampaignDetails as string,
		SalesAmt as string,
		Currency as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> getSalesCampaign
getJson foldDown(unroll(conversions),
	mapColumn(
		id,
		type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Flatten1
getSalesCampaign, Flatten1 join(Currency == id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(UsSalesAmt = toDouble(SalesAmt)/toDouble(type)) ~> getUsAmt
getUsAmt sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		{Flight#},
		Origin,
		Dest,
		FlightDate,
		CampaignDetails,
		SalesAmt,
		Currency,
		UsSalesAmt
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> getcsv
